title: Did Missouri's bill propose the prison of librarians?
subtitle: The House Act 2044, which was aimed at events such as the "Drag Queen Story Time" in public libraries, provoked controversy when it was introduced in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Bill HB 2044, which is before the Missouri State House of Representatives, may result in the imprisonment of librarians for non-compliance with its provisions.
